summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 5, 2019. It includes inmate rosters, official out-count forms, and count slips, which are routine records of inmate location and headcounts. The significance lies in the inclusion of Jeffrey Epstein's name on an attorney visit roster, placing him at the MCC the day before his death.

events.title: Daily Prison Administrative Counts
events.description: Routine administrative headcounts and location tracking of inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, including out-counts for assignments and attorney visits.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate (register number 76318-054) at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 5, 2019.
Epstein's entry is on an 'Inmate Roster' for an attorney (ATTY) visit, indicating he had or was scheduled for a legal meeting that day.
The document is dated August 5, 2019, which is the day before Epstein was found dead in his cell on August 10, 2019.
Several other inmates on the rosters have notes indicating 'SUICIDE OR' next to their assignment codes, which appears to be a standard administrative code.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate counts, assignments, and movements, providing a snapshot of prison operations on a specific date.
